Which of the following successfully select the diagonal elements of the matrix  
$\mathbb{A} = \begin{bmatrix}1 & 0\\2 & 3\end{bmatrix}$ represented in R by `A<-matrix(c(1,2,0,3),2,2)`?

(a) $\quad$ `A[c(1,1),c(2,2)]`

(b) $\quad$ `A[rbind(c(1,1),c(2,2))]`

(c) $\quad$  `A[cbind(c(1,1),c(2,2))]`

(d) $\quad$ `A[matrix(c(TRUE,FALSE,FALSE,TRUE),2)]`

(d) $\quad$ all of (a,b,c,d)

(e) $\quad$ none of (a,b,c,d)

(f) $\quad$ (b) and (d) only

(g) $\quad$ (a) and (b) only
